Ont. portion as described

Lake Ontario (Black River Bay)

Black River Bay constitutes that portion of Lake

Ontario lying northeasterly of line beginning at Bull Rock Point and running
southeasterly to Sackets Harbor light on Horse Island and thence running
directly east to main shore out of Sackets Harbor. Muskalonge Bay is
included. E-15nw E-15ne D-15se

Lake Ontario (Oswego Harbor)

Oswego Harbor constitutes that portion of Lake

Ontario from mouth of Oswego River (Ont. 66) at Oswego and extending to a line
drawn from east breakwater light to west pierhead light and enclosed by west
harbor breakwater and east harbor breakwater and its extension to nearby
mainland. G-13ne

Lake Ontario (Rochester Harbor)

Rochester harbor entrance constitutes that portion
of Lake Ontario formed by entension into Lake of Genesee River bounded by east
and west piers from natural mouth of river to a line drawn from east pier light
to Rochester harbor light. H-9ne
